name: musicvibe-cicd-project
description: Production-grade CI/CD platform for MusicVibe application with Jenkins, Kubernetes, SonarQube, Nexus, and monitoring

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=apps/api && npm install --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/api/dist apps/api/node_modules apps/frontend/dist apps/frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop musicvibe && docker rm musicvibe

author: Temitayo Charles Akinniranye
